short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Koala is an extension, designed to bring Twitter users' basic or customized information requests through a box.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Koala is an extension, designed to bring Twitter users' basic or customized information requests through a box.

For example, with this extension, users can view information such as the last played matches of that team, the score status in the league, or the list of players while in the account of a football team.

Or, while on a company's Twitter account, they can see the company's stock market value or customize them as desired.

Or, a user can access the their Github events list through this plugin and easily access the information they want.

Koala is currently under in development and this extension will definitely have a suggestion box for each type of user!
